formatName: Final Cut Pro XML Interchange Format
formatDescription: fcpxml is a specialised format used in Apple's Final Cut Pro which uses xml elements to describe the data exchanged between Final Cut Pro and third-party applications and tools.
provenanceCompoundName: Brigham Young University / Brigham Young University

internalSignatures.name: Final Cut Pro XML Interchange Format
internalSignatures.note: Absolute from beginning of file, magic bytes: <?xml version=("|')1.0("|'){0-128}xmeml
